day1.description: Today I hung out with my housemates's cat, Mouse. She's usually a menace and always screams for attention, but today she was in the mood for a nap. I was tired and fell asleep with her on the couch (shout out to April for the picture).

day2.description: I really love collecting things, and my latest obsession has been keychains. I have an embarrassing amount and decided to organize them by color so it's easier to find the ones I want to use.

day3.description: I sat in the arboretum today and journaled! It felt nice to sit in the shade and be surrounded by birds/natural ambience. It was peaceful, aside from suffering from the most intense allergies.

day4.description: It was really hot today, so I made a frozen watermelon slushy drink with lime/mint sparkling water. I was pleasantly surprised with how this turned out!

day5.description: My housemates and I deep cleaned our blackhole of a fridge and threw out all of the stuff that was expired/forgotten about. This is the cleanest it's probably been in 2 years!

day6.description: I collect a (concerning amount of) CDs because I'm a huge nerd when it comes to CD design and I like collecting physical media for my radio show. Today I listened to some of the new CDs I bought.

day7.description: Lately I've been in a childhood-nostalgia phase, so I've been rewatching a lot of shows that I enjoyed when I was 12. Right now I'm rewatching soul eater!

day8.description: I met up with a friend today because they wanted to give me an early birthday present. They got me this cute orange bunny keychain! I love him!!
